name: Population estimates of response proportions in percentages for importance of and satisfaction with nine job-related factors, by selected years: 2015, 2017, and 2019
description: Population estimates of response proportions in percentages for importance of and satisfaction with nine job-related factors, by selected years: 2015, 2017, and 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: The values presented here are provided for reference only as they are based on applying the sampling weights to the reduced samples for each collection cycle used for the current project (2015: n = 78,286; 2017: n = 85,720; 2019: n = 80,869) and therefore do not match the official values reported by the National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics. Percentages may not sum to 100% due to rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients, 2015, 2017, and 2019.
